message: Has anyone deployed a Bottle app on ep.io? If so, comments? Problems?
Hmm, I remember someone trying, but I forget who it was

I've just successfully done it but it took a bit of puzzling. The magic was to define a variable app = bottle.app() in app.py and then using the entrypoint app:app. Although this is an old thread I thought it might be helpful for future google help explorers.
I lounch succerfully Bottle app, I just set entrypoint = server:home, where "server" is the name of main file, and "home" - my index page function. My server.py file - http://dumpz.org/102567/
